      • payout

        public final void payout(Context<?> respCtx,
          GameType supportedGameType,
          PrizeDto prize,
          java.util.List<? extends BaseTicket> hostTickets)
                  throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: PayoutStrategy
        Perform the real payout. This method will update ticket and generate payout log according to the payout mode.
        指定者:
        payout 在接口中 PayoutStrategy
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of transaction.
        prize - The detailed prize information.
        hostTickets - The host tickets.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business exception.

      • assemblePayoutDetail

        protected void assemblePayoutDetail(Context<?> respCtx,
                        Payout payout,
                        PrizeItemDto prizeItem,
                        PrizeDto prize)
                             throws ApplicationException
        Generate payout details. Based on a single 'prizeItem', single cash payout detail record(sum the cash of all prizeLevelItems) and multiple object payout detail records(if exists) will be generated.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
